meanings.definition: Lack of smoothness or regularity in surface or texture.
meanings.sent1: The unevenness of the road made the car ride bumpy.
meanings.sent2: The painter tried to fix the unevenness of the wall before applying a new coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The unevenness of the cake made it look like a mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The unevenness of her handwriting resembled a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The unevenness of the ground caused the ball to bounce unpredictably.

meanings.definition: Lack of equality or balance in distribution or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The unevenness in the distribution of candies upset the children.
meanings.sent2: The unevenness of wealth distribution is a major issue in society.
meanings.sent3: The unevenness of the seating arrangement at the party led to some awkward conversations.
meanings.sent4: The unevenness of power among the team members caused conflicts.
meanings.sent5: The unevenness of responsibilities in the group created tension.

meanings.definition: Lack of uniformity or consistency in quality or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The unevenness in the quality of the products was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The unevenness in the quantity of ingredients affected the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The unevenness of the colors in the painting gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The unevenness in the texture of the fabric made it difficult to sew.
meanings.sent5: The unevenness in the taste of the dish surprised the diners.
